Question: MGM cast this person in Lassie Come Home (1943) with child star Roddy McDowall, with whom she would share a lifelong friendship.
Hints: This person became increasingly unsatisfied with the roles being offered to her at the time.
In the early 1980s, this person moved to Bel Air, Los Angeles, which was her residence until her death.
This person was hospitalized more than 70 times and had at least 20 major operations.
